A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are a lot of things that I i felt were good with this movie\, but overall the pacing\, plot and just general sloppiness of the writing killed it for me. I keep seeing people saying its a new take\, but when you rip whole scenes worth of dialogue it isn't new. \n\nI understand people are excited for the 'new' Star Wars\, but for me; i just can't be happy about a movie that wants to burn down what came before it. There's a difference between moving on\, and trampling on what came before you. The movie had promise and potential\, but it was lost somewhere (maybe the cutting room floor).
